name: List Formatting
description: Tests the model's ability to properly format and structure lists in presentations

prompts.text: Create a presentation about project management best practices. Use properly formatted bullet lists on at least 3 slides. Each list should have a clear hierarchy with main points and sub-points properly indented. Use consistent bullet styles with round bullets for main points and dashes for sub-points.

Create a presentation outlining a 5-step process for strategic planning. Use properly formatted numbered lists for the process steps. Each numbered step should have 2-3 bullet points explaining key actions. Ensure consistent formatting, proper indentation, and logical numbering throughout the presentation.

hierarchy_clarity.description: Clear visual hierarchy in list structures

bullet_style_appropriateness.description: Appropriate use of bullet styles and numbering
